T-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_0
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_1
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FlangeWidth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:WebThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_2
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FlangeThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_3
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_0
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FlangeEdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_1
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:WebEdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_2
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:WebSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure_0
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FlangeSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_1
}
```
